00030 #ifndef SC_COR_QT_H
00031 #define SC_COR_QT_H
00032 
00033 
00034 #if !defined(_WIN32) && !defined(WIN32) && !defined(WIN64)  && !defined(SC_USE_PTHREADS)
00035 
00036 #include "sysc/kernel/sc_cor.h"
00037 #include "sysc/packages/qt/qt.h"
00038 
00039 namespace sc_core {
00040 
00041 class sc_cor_pkg_qt;
00042 typedef sc_cor_pkg_qt sc_cor_pkg_t;
00043 
00044 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00045 //  CLASS : sc_cor_qt
00046 //
00047 //  Coroutine class implemented with QuickThreads.
00048 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00049 
00050 class sc_cor_qt
00051 : public sc_cor
00052 {
00053 public:
00054 
00055     // constructor
00056     sc_cor_qt()
00057         : m_stack_size( 0 ), m_stack( 0 ), m_sp( 0 ), m_pkg( 0 )
00058         {}
00059 
00060     // destructor
00061     virtual ~sc_cor_qt()
00062         { delete[] (char*) m_stack; }
00063 
00064     // switch stack protection on/off
00065     virtual void stack_protect( bool enable );
00066 
00067 public:
00068 
00069     std::size_t    m_stack_size;  // stack size
00070     void*          m_stack;       // stack
00071     qt_t*          m_sp;          // stack pointer
00072 
00073     sc_cor_pkg_qt* m_pkg;         // the creating coroutine package
00074 
00075 private:
00076 
00077     // disabled
00078     sc_cor_qt( const sc_cor_qt& );
00079     sc_cor_qt& operator = ( const sc_cor_qt& );
00080 };
00081 
00082 
00083 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00084 //  CLASS : sc_cor_pkg_qt
00085 //
00086 //  Coroutine package class implemented with QuickThreads.
00087 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00088 
00089 class sc_cor_pkg_qt
00090 : public sc_cor_pkg
00091 {
00092 public:
00093 
00094     // constructor
00095     sc_cor_pkg_qt( sc_simcontext* simc );
00096 
00097     // destructor
00098     virtual ~sc_cor_pkg_qt();
00099 
00100     // create a new coroutine
00101     virtual sc_cor* create( std::size_t stack_size, sc_cor_fn* fn, void* arg );
00102 
00103     // yield to the next coroutine
00104     virtual void yield( sc_cor* next_cor );
00105 
00106     // abort the current coroutine (and resume the next coroutine)
00107     virtual void abort( sc_cor* next_cor );
00108 
00109     // get the main coroutine
00110     virtual sc_cor* get_main();
00111 
00112 private:
00113 
00114     static int instance_count;
00115 
00116 private:
00117 
00118     // disabled
00119     sc_cor_pkg_qt();
00120     sc_cor_pkg_qt( const sc_cor_pkg_qt& );
00121     sc_cor_pkg_qt& operator = ( const sc_cor_pkg_qt& );
00122 };
00123 
00124 } // namespace sc_core
00125 
00126 #endif
